title: Self-management education programs (SMEPs) for adults with coexisting overweight or obesity and knee osteoarthritis: A systematic review.
abstract: This review aimed to synthesize the content and delivery of SMEPs and explore outcomes improvement (pain, knee function, weight loss, and quality of life) in adults with overweight/obesity and KOA across RCTs, non-RCTs, and cohorts.
journal: Journal of bodywork and movement therapies
